summary: Digital Marketing Strategist with 10+ years leading B2B, eCommerce, programmatic, and performance marketing initiatives across global markets. Proven ability to scale ROI-driven campaigns, lead cross-functional teams, and implement marketing automation systems that improve efficiency and revenue. Skilled in ABM, paid media, and CRM-driven communication strategies.

achievements: Oversaw multi-channel digital marketing programs for enterprise clients.

Managed CRM automation workflows using Eloqua.
Improved client engagement by 15% through strategic ABM initiatives.
Managed full programmatic lifecycle from planning to optimization.
Improved budget utilization by 25% via SEM audits.
Increased ad performance by 30% using audience insights.
Led media buying and cross-channel reporting.
Managed multiple digital accounts across eCommerce channels.
Improved campaign performance by 20% via reporting optimization.
Increased client satisfaction by 10% through strategy alignment.
Led cross-functional marketing team for global clients.
Increased lead conversions by 25% through automation workflows.
Managed programmatic media buying and reporting.
